description:
Jyugo, Uno, Nico, Liang, Upa, Honey, and Trois make their way through Building 5 underground cell to find the captured guards.
They hide in the file room and Jyugo finds document about himself and finds a shocking information.
The group encounters a Building 5 guard, Rokuriki, who is under someone’s control.
Liang and Upa tells Jyugo to keep going while they take care of Rokuriki.
Source: crunchyroll
